import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link , Outlet, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' const UserLayout = () => { const [item,setItem]=useState({}) const [pic,setpic]=useState(""); const navigate=useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { // Bootstrap dropdowns ko manually initialize karna const bootstrap = require('bootstrap'); document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-toggle').forEach((dropdown) => { new bootstrap.Dropdown(dropdown); }); }, []); return (
